lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Commenting on earnings results, Bijur said he expected first quarter profit to be lower than last year's earnings of 84 mln dlrs or 70 cts a share, due to lower profit contribution from production because of lower oil prices.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: After considering making an acquisition for several months, Texaco Canada set up a "business development team" of five people about one month ago to increase its efforts, Bijur said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: As previously reported, Texaco Inc is seeking a court order to block Pennzoil from taking action to secure a 10.3 billion dlr judgement against Texaco.
